attributes.action: commit to co-fund improvements to Silverstone to help retain the British F1 GP and regional jobs and industry worth £40m+
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A staple on the Formula One calendar since the beginning of the World Championship in 1950, the British Grand Prix has recently come under threat from F1 authorities due to the substandard facilities at Silverstone, currently Britain's premier racing venue. Savesilverstone.com, and the signatories of this petition request that the Prime Minister seeks to co-fund the redevelopment of Silverstone and increase government support for motorsports in general, to safeguard Britain, and indeed Silverstone's place at the heart of global motorsports and protect our rich motorsporting legacy.
